_comment: Project-specific Atlassian settings - update when cloning to another project/instance

custom_fields._note: Custom field IDs are instance-level. If using different Jira instance, run: acli jira issue get ISSUE-1 --output json | jq '.fields | keys'

jira._issue_link_note: Link type names must match exactly. Get via: jira_get_link_types()

team._note: Team roster is in ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md (global) - update there for team changes
